website_summaries.verdict: One of the better weed torches for general use around the yard or on farms when something larger is required.
pros: Offers great control using the long handle
Easy to hook up and secure to most propane tanks
Comes with a unique booster feature to temporarily increase flame intensity
cons: Turbo blast lever can stick in the open position, requiring some extra force to cut the flame off

customer_reviews.title: Sear steaks with propane torch
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this torch to sear steaks (inspired by Guga Foods, Sous Vide Everything). The torch produced a great crust on the steaks in under 20 seconds with no propane taste. The pressure control knob did not work well. I could not reliably control the output using it so I had to use the knob on the propane tank to control output.
customer_reviews.author: Oliver

customer_reviews.title: Not a Flame Thrower
customer_reviews.text: That is what the page says when you are reading about this thing. It may not be a 'flame thrower' but it sure is a good 'weed killer' and sounds like a jet taking off. Much better than the local discount tool store version, which the connectors kept getting loose as I used it leaking propane at the handle. This unit - no issues and works well. I want another for my left hand, twice the weed killing power!!!
customer_reviews.author: Gadget Girl

customer_reviews.title: Hot
customer_reviews.text: Likes:Easy to light, powerful, and very good starting up my charcoal. Take less than 90 seconds to get a good start on charcoal and waiting to put the food on the grill is cut by 75%. Dislikes: As anything with fire, it's dangerous. Keep it away from plastics and especially people.
customer_reviews.author: Suderbooter

customer_reviews.title: Keeps blowing itself out.
customer_reviews.text: This thing has no regulator, it delivers full tank pressure to the flame when the trigger is depressed. It shoots out a HUGE flame that immediately incinerates the edges of the plant in question. After a couple of shots, it blows itself out. It's also loud, and between the blast and the fire I fear it would draw a lot of negative attention, even if it stayed lit. One star. I am returning it.
customer_reviews.author: PaulTD

customer_reviews.title: My husband loves it!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my husband for father's day. He loves it! He's been using it to kill the weeds in to yard.
customer_reviews.author: Allison Rudisel

customer_reviews.title: Great product . Great service.
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what we needed to kill the weeds in our parking area, around our steps, and walkways without using chemicals. Easy to set up, easy to use. Did a very good job. There was a confusing delay in the shipping ( and the notifications about the shipment) but the seller responded quickly to our concerns and the item showed up as promised. With so many people ordering Items on line there is bound to be some confusion and delays. The sellers quick response was reassuring that our item was on its way. The only thing I would improve on the item, would be a slightly longer handle.....otherwise we are happy with the product.
customer_reviews.author: joanna gemmell

customer_reviews.title: Daddy’s New Toy
customer_reviews.text: Well, I’ve pondered getting one of these for a while and did a ton of research. I chose this one and I’m pretty happy with it. Super easy to use, super hot, and super fun! This will knock down weeds almost instantly! Keep in mind, be very careful with this as it’s easy to set anything a blaze. I love using this as my fire pit starter! Set up the fire and point this at it for about 30 seconds and BOOM! Fire started. I read this is great to sear steaks as well. Haven’t tried yet but definitely see how this would be effective.
customer_reviews.author: foote410

customer_reviews.title: Best weed burner I've used.
customer_reviews.text: Without a lighter it is necessary to use a little pocket torch for any additional relightings. It does have good controls a low power can be set and the squeeze lever for full power. It, in itself, is maneuverable but the propane tank is not, it needs to be strapped on to a dolly.
customer_reviews.author: stuart shafer

customer_reviews.title: Light weight easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and easy to light. Connection to propane tank is cou ter clock wise, which is. Ot mention within the directions.
customer_reviews.author: George Willings

customer_reviews.title: BBQ efficiency!
customer_reviews.text: Can't speak to how well it incinerates weeds, but this torch lights a mean BBQ! Works great to fire up the smoker. Coals, logs, etc. Ergonomically ideal and long enough that you don't feel the crazy heat blasting out of it. One FYI, this thing is LOUD. Like a mini jet blasting.
customer_reviews.author: E.R.

customer_reviews.title: Need an arsenal in the tool shed? BBQ? Weeds?
customer_reviews.text: Awesome torch!!! Did the job with toasting up the backyard weeds. This is also great to get BBQ fire going in 5 mins and ready to grill! Other reviewers were right about flame going out, there are things that are out of your control but all you have to do is light it up again.
customer_reviews.author: Dre C

customer_reviews.title: Be careful, this is a flame thrower.
customer_reviews.text: I light a smoker burn box with it vs. using a chimney to start my coals.
customer_reviews.author: Paul K.

customer_reviews.title: Works well for lighting the bbq pit and searing meats
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to light my bbq pit and sear sous vide meats. The trigger is kind of a hazard to have for this use so caution is needed. A standard 20# tank should last a long time. Quality seems pretty good. A regulator would definitely make it safer to use.
customer_reviews.author: Vincent A

customer_reviews.title: Worked good
customer_reviews.text: It works good .. I just wish it was little longer .. I’m 6’2 and had to hunch over Using it .. did kill weeds good .. just don’t get to close to bushes and trees ..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 10 foot flame
customer_reviews.text: would be great for a pyrotechnic show, but not good for a controlled flame. No matter how low we had the manual valve turned down, we had a 10 foot flame with we used the trigger portion of the wand. Very dangerous.
customer_reviews.author: Cole

customer_reviews.title: Finally a tool that works....
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best propane torches I have come across. Lightweight, self igniting, and a boost when needed. I made a backpack for my tank and I am able to get a lot accomplished with this unit. Nice Job.
customer_reviews.author: Jess M

customer_reviews.title: Boom!
customer_reviews.text: This thing works wonders and is a darn flame thrower almost! :) Love it!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Rod

customer_reviews.title: I use it for camp fires and it works well.
customer_reviews.text: I basically use it to start camp fires and coals in my bar b pit and it is easy and a lot cheaper than using lighter fluid of both.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Simple to use
customer_reviews.text: Great little torch. I use it to fire charcoal in my large smoker. The seller is a great person, and will answer any questions quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Jonello

customer_reviews.title: everyone should have one
customer_reviews.text: awsome product. i used it to do heat boosts for my wood oven floor, weed burning and wax curing barrels.
customer_reviews.author: SpGH

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product. Did great for melting snow and starting bonfire in middle of snow.
customer_reviews.author: justin

customer_reviews.title: big flame
customer_reviews.text: This is a pretty decent flame thrower and works well for torching my weeds on the driveway/sidewalk
customer_reviews.author: mike

customer_reviews.title: NEW TOOL
customer_reviews.text: Wow why was I so hesitate. Works very well. Has a lot of safety .
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Awesome use it to light my smoker be careful when set on high it’s like a jet
customer_reviews.author: Brian Todd

customer_reviews.title: Exceeds My High Expectations.
customer_reviews.text: Ease of use,and the fact that it works like the one I had 30 years ago.
customer_reviews.author: Terry Bell

customer_reviews.title: Everyone needs one
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product with a ton of uses...especially impressing children and other Dads
customer_reviews.author: David P Mills

customer_reviews.title: Makes cooking with charcoal fast and easy
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Use it for lighting my charcoal grill. Definite game changer.
customer_reviews.author: cfranges

customer_reviews.title: Tank Connector does not fit Standard 20 lb Barbecue Propane Tank!
customer_reviews.text: Could not set up since the Tank Connector given does not fit Standard 20 lb Barbecue Propane Tank! Also is heavy to carry if I could connect. Will need to return unless I find a way to connect to 20 lb Barbecue Propane Tank!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No replacement parts
customer_reviews.text: The product is good until you need to replace the hose. I bought this product late 2017. After some time, the hose eventually breaks and will need to be replaced. Amazon doesn’t carry a replacement hose. I tried several online stores, no success. So I can’t use it. Before you buy this consider replacement parts otherwise it will be a disposable product. If anyone knows where to buy the hose, reply to this review.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars108 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
